vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PRIVATE_ETH_CELL.collect (patch_0.sol#31-39):
	External calls:
	- Log.addMessage(msg.sender,_am,Collect) (patch_0.sol#34)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! msg.sender.send(_am) (patch_0.sol#35-38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_0.sol#36)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
